actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Tianjin State Security Department (APT10)
description: Multiple Chinese APT groups leveraged the Russia and Ukraine war as a lure for cyberespionage operations. The APT groups have been using sanctions-related baits to attack Russian defense institutes, part of the Rostec Corporation. The hackers used new tools, which have not previously been described: a sophisticated multi-layered loader and a backdoor dubbed SPINNER. These tools use advanced evasion and anti-analysis techniques such as multi-layer in-memory loaders and compiler-level obfuscations. The operation targeted defense research institutes in Russia and possibly also in Belarus. The purpose of the backdoor and the operation is likely to collect information from targets inside the high-tech Russian defense industry to support China in its technological advancement.

Anonymous leaked 28GB worth of a Russian bank's data now available for public download. Distributed Denial of Secrets (aka DDoSecrets) announced archiving the entire data on its official website. Those 35,000 files contain some of the regulator's "secret agreements". They have been distributed to various online points. According to a post by the BBC Russian Service, in the files are hundreds of audit reports and information on bank owners.

description: The Anonymous collective takes responsibility for taking down top Russian government websites in a series of DDoS attacks. The list of the targets include the official website of the Federal Security Service (FSB), the Stock Exchange, the Analytical Center for the Government of the Russian Federation, and the Ministry of Sport of the Russian Federation.

The developer behind the popular "node-ipc" NPM package released a new tampered version to condemn Russia's invasion of Ukraine. The alterations introduced by its maintainer RIAEvangelist brought about undesirable behavior by targeting users with IP addresses located either in Russia or Belarus, and wiping arbitrary file contents and replacing them with a heart emoji. In a latter release, any time the node-ipc module functionality gets called, it prints to STDOUT a message taken out of the peacenotwar module, as well as places a file on the user's Desktop directory with contents relating to the current war-time situation of Russia and Ukraine.

On January 14, 2022 Orthodox New Year, over 70 Ukrainian government websites were defaced with political imagery and a statement in Russian, Ukrainian, and Polish before going down temporarily. Most sites were restored within hours. The attack crippled much of the government's public-facing digital infrastructure, including the most widely used site for handling government services online, Diia. Diia also has a role in Ukraine's coronavirus response and in encouraging vaccination. It also crippled the sites of the Cabinet of Ministers, and the ministries of energy, sports, agriculture, veterans' affairs, and ecology. The Ukrainian company Kitsoft also confirmed that it found the WhisperGate malware on some of its systems. At least 50 of the 70 sites targeted for defacement were developed and maintained by Kitsoft. Kitsoft was compromised, which allowed the hackers to gain access to Kitsoft's administrator panel and use the company's credentials to deface customer web sites.

Microsoft identified a destructive malware (dubbed WhisperGate) operation targeting multiple organizations in Ukraine. This malware first appeared on victim systems in Ukraine on January 13, 2022. The malware is assessed to be designed to look like ransomware but lacking a ransom recovery mechanism and is intended to be destructive rendering targeted devices inoperable rather than to obtain a ransom. Victims span multiple government, non-profit, and information technology organizations. A Ukrainian IT company also confirmed that it found the WhisperGate malware on some of its systems. At least 50 of the 70 sites targeted for defacement were developed and maintained by the said IT company. The latter was compromised, which allowed the hackers to gain access to its' administrator panel and use the company's credentials to deface customer web sites. Microsoft named the samples WhisperGate, while other security companies labeled the downloader as WhisperGate and WhisperKill as the actual wiper, which was considered a component of WhisperGate.

description: Massive pan-Asian retail chain operator Dairy Farm Group was attacked this month by the REvil ransomware operation. The attackers claim to have demanded a $30 million ransom.

The Reserve Bank of New Zealand is the victim of a cyberattack. The data breach occurred through a vulnerability in a File Transfer Application provided by Accellion that was targeted in mid-December and affected multiple victims.
Email security provider Mimecast said that hackers hijacked its products in order to spy on its customers. It is believed that Mimecast is another victim of the SolarWinds hack.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Lorenz executed exfiltration of data and ransomeware in targeted network. Data presented on dark web "leak site"
The biographies of outgoing US President Donald Trump and his Vice President Mike Pence were changed on the official US State Department website by a disgruntled employee.
Delta Dental Plans Association has its data dumped by the Egregor ransomware group.
An unconfirmed Australian dental surgery practice has its data dumped by the Egregor ransomware group. However, the victim is not listed on Egregor's leak site.
3BB, a subsidiary of Jasmine International PLC, has been hacked by the ALTDOS hackers.
Lorenz executed exfiltration of data and ransomeware in targeted network. Data presented on dark web "leak site"

A hacker who goes by the name Crash Override on Twitter claims she found a web address that Parler used internally to retrieve data. She made a list of all posts, videos, and images uploaded to Parler, including posts that users had deleted, such as those referring to the Capitol attack on January 6.

organization: Preferred Home Care of New York
description: Preferred Home Care of New York is attacked by the REvil ransomware gang.

organization: Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts
description: The Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts on Wednesday disclosed the "apparent compromise" of the electronic filing and case management system, known as CM/ECF. An AO spokesperson stated the compromise is likely connected to the hack of SolarWinds' Orion products, which affected multiple government agencies and companies.
Arizona Complete Health is impacted by the Accellion breach.
The Mono Next Public Company Limited, a Jasmine International PLC subsidiary, has been hacked by the ALTDOS hackers after negotiations following an attack on 3BB (another Jasmine subsidiary) failed.
A former Kentucky prinicpal has been ordered to pay $3.6 million for confiscating students' phones, and downloading and trading their nude photos online.
The Durham Region joins the list of the victims of the Accellion breach.
California Health & Wellness joins the list of the victims of the Accellion breach.
Trinity Health reports that 580,000 patients have been affected by the Accellion data breach.
Ticketmaster has been fined $10 million for illegally accessing the systems of CrowdSurge, one of its competitors.
A hacker group called Spiderz claims to have successfully hacked into the Hezbollah's Al-Qard Al-Hassan financial organization and leaks details on depositors and borrowers from the lender.

Hackers have compromised the Parliament of Finalnd and accessed to the email accounts of some of its members. The incident occurred in the fall of 2020 around the same time Norway's Parliament was subject to a similar attack. In March 2021, Finnish officials attributed the attack to APT31.
Whirlpool has been attacked by the Nefilim ransomware threat actors.

Singtel and the QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute disclosed data breaches caused by a vulnerability in the Accellion FTA secure file transfer software. "A third-party file sharing system provided by Accellion called FTA has been illegally accessed through a zero-day vulnerability or previously unknown vulnerability. Singtel uses this system to share information internally as well as with external stakeholders and organisations," Singtel announced in a security incident notification.

QIMR Berghofer Medical Research Institute disclosed a data breach caused by a vulnerability in the Accellion FTA secure file transfer software. According to the research institute, the data breach appears to have occurred on December 25, 2020, when threat actors accessed approximately 4 percent, or 620MB, of data stored on the Accellion FTA service.

organization: Office of the Washington State Auditor
description: Washington's State Auditor office has suffered a data breach that exposed the personal information in 1.6 million employment claims. The Office of the Washington State Auditor ("SAO") states that they suffered a data breach after a threat actor exploited a vulnerability in a secure file transfer service from Accellion.

A hacking group has posted files that it claims to be from Jones Day after the law firm was hit by a data breach at one of its vendors. Jones Day denied that its own network had been hacked and said the vendor hack was not a ransomware attack.
The ransomware group Pay2Key, which has been linked to Iran, claims to have stolen almost 1TB of data (and as proof publishes 3 gigabytes) from the Israeli cyber security company Portnox.
The Belgian financial consultant Finalyse has fallen victim to a ransomware attack.
Colorado-based short line rail operator and logistics provider OmniTRAX was hit by a recent ransomware attack and data theft that targeted its corporate parent, Broe Group
The Department of Justice has revealed that hackers have accessed its networks as a result of the SolarWinds hack. The attackers breached the Department's Office 365 system and read its emails.
The REvil ransomware gang hacks The Hospital Group and threatens to release before-and-after pictures of celebrity clients.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Sangoma has disclosed a data breach after files that were stolen by the Conti ransomware threat actors were published online after an attack.
Transform Hospital Group has been attacked by the REvil ransomware threat actors.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,External Denial of Service,Data Attack,Internal Denial of Service
description: The Scottish Environment Protection Agency is targeted in a cyberattack which has impacted its contact center, internal systems, processes and internal communications. The incident is revealed to be a ransomware attack by the Conti gang.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Gastroenterology Consultants Ltd have some data dumped from the Conti ransomware group.
The website of the European Court of Human Rights was knocked offline after issuing a ruling that called on Turkey to release a prominent Kurdish politician.
Leon Medical Centers has been attacked by the Conti ransomware gang.

Iranian-linked hackers leaked sensitive data on the dark web. The attack comes in the backdrop of Iranian pledge to retaliate against the killing of key Iranian nuclear scientist Mohsen Fakhrizadhe last month.
Vmware had its systems breached as a result of the Solarwinds hack.
The ransomware group Pay2Key, linked to Iran, claims to have successfully hacked the largest Israeli airpower defense corporation: Israel Aerospace Industries.

London-based reporter Rani Dridi has had her iPhone compromised with what appears Pegasus spyware for the past year. Researchers have said Dridi was likely targeted by the government of the UAE. The campaign is also thought to have affected at least 36 other journalists working for Al Jazeera and been perpetrated by the UAE, Saudi Arabia, and two other unnamed actors.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Lorenz executed exfiltration of data and ransomeware in targeted network. Data presented on dark web "leak site"
Florida officials have anonymously said that the state's Agency for Healthcare Administration was infiltrated as a result of the SolarWinds hack.
Brendon Gyermek., a retailer of baby clothes, reveals to have been hit with a Zeppelin ransomware attack.
The National Nuclear Security Administration has revealed that hackers have accessed its networks as a result of the SolarWinds hack.
The Department of Energy has revealed that hackers have accessed its networks as a result of the SolarWinds hack.

Smart Mortgage has filed a suit against Brian Noe, one of its former senior loan processors, for allegedly stealing a database containing client information and bringing it to NEXA Mortgage, his new employer.
The Virginia State Corporation Commission has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Cisco has been compromised by the SolarWinds hackers.
The City of Austin has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.
The US Department of State has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.
The US Department of Homeland Security has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.
The Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Agency has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.

organization: US Department of Health's National Institutes of Health
description: The US Department of Health's National Institutes of Health has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.

organization: US Department of Commerce's National Telecommunications and Information Administration
description: The US Department of Commerce's National Telecommunications and Information Administration has been breached by the SolarWinds hackers.
Microsoft states that its internal network was breached by the SolarWinds hackers and then used to further attacks against other companies.
Taylor Made Diagnostics is attacked by the Conti ransomware gang.
A London ad agency that counts Atlantic Records, Suzuki, and Penguin Random House among its clients has had its files dumped online by a ransomware gang.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Forward Air has been attacked by Hades, a new ransomware threat actor.
Wildan Group suffers a Conti ransomware attack, 136Gb of data is leaked.

Automotive services provider Inchcape Australia appears to have been compromised by the Windows Ransomexx ransomware, with the cyber criminals who hit the company leaking some data that they stole, on the dark web.
Automotive services provider Inchcape Australia appears to have been hit by the Ransomexx ransomware, with the cyber criminals leaking some data that they stole, on the dark web.
Apex Laboratory is attacked by the DoppelPaymer ransomware gang.
The Weslaco Independent School District in Texas is a victim of the Conti ransomware threat actors.
The Department of the Treasury is a victim of the SolarWinds hack. The hackers, who are backed by a foreign government, stole information from its networks.

SolarWinds has been hacked by alleged Russian state-sponsored actors in a supply chain attack. As a result, the hackers installed a backdoor that allowed them to penetrate the systems of dozens of companies and US government agencies for months.
AI processor developer Haban Labs has been hit by the Pay2Key ransomware. Pay2Key has been tied to Iran.
Amital Data is hit by a cyberattack. As a result, at least 40 of its clients are affected as well. Iranian hackers are suspected.
Nygard, a Canada-based fashion line, is hit with a ransomware attack.
Personal information belonging to clients of Staircase Financial Management has been published on the dark web after the company fell to a ransomware attack.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,External Denial of Service,Data Attack
description: A cyberattack has disabled Promutuel Assurance's IT systems. The attack looks to be the work of the DoppelPaymer ransomware gang.
Dassault Falcon Jet has been attacked by the RagnarLocker ransomware operators.

actor: Ryan S. Hernandez AKA Ryan West AKA RyanRocks
description: Ryan Hernandez, a California man who admitted to hacking Nintendo and leaking proprietary data several times since 2016 has been sentenced to three years in prison.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Presidential Palace in Afghanistan.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Sri Lankan Ministry of Defense.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Afghanistan National Security Council.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Nepali Army.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Nepali Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
Researchers from Trend Micro discover a new campaign from the Sidewinder APT targeting government entities in South Asia. One of the targets is the Nepali Ministry of Defense.

FireEye has revealed that a nation-state hacking group has accessed its systems and stolen hacking tools it uses for penetration testing. Later it was revealed that FireEye was breached as a result of the SolarWinds hack.
Payment card processing company TSYS has suffered a ransomware attack. The attackers also stole and publishe TSYS data.
The Avaddon threat actors claim to have attacked the city of Dade City, FL.

A court in China finds a Gionee subsidiary guilty of intentionally installing malware on millions of smartphones. The company knowingly infected nearly 21.75 million devices with a Trojan and made $4.2 million in profit.
Nutrasource, a firm that does clinical trials, is among the unconfirmed victims of the Egregor ransomware. Egregor claims to have struck the company.

organization: Students at a Cardiff high school

description: Human resources firm Ranstad has been attacked by the Egregor ransomware threat actors.
CGSEC, a Thai securities trading firm, has been hacked by a group calling itself ALTDOS. Th hackers stole sensitive documents and encrypted files on the CGSEC network.
Kmart has suffered a ransomware attack by the Egregor operators. The Windows domain for Kmart was compromised during the attack.
Sporting goods retailer Intersport has been hit with a Conti ransomware attack. The threat actors have dumped more than two dozen files as proof of access.
A hacker calling himself "Daniel" hijacked the Spotify pages of several artists to pledge his love for Taylor Swift.

Canada Post informs 44 of its large commercial customers that a ransomware attack on Commport Communications, a third-party service provider, exposed shipping information for their customers. The ransomware group called Lorenz has leaked information on their data leak site.
Warren-Washington-Albany ARC has some data leaked by the Conti ransomware gang.

description: A ransomware attack by the Egregor threat actors has crippled the operations of TransLink, the public transportation agency of Vancouver, Canada.
Online education giant K12 Inc. reveals to have paid a ransom after their systems were hit by the Ryuk ransomware in the middle of November.

A cybercrime group calling themselves 'BlackShadow' tweets that they hacked into the Israeli Shirbit insurance company and stole files during the attack. The threat actors extort the company by demanding almost $1 million in bitcoin to stop leaking the company's stolen data.

The Nama Khoi Municipality in the Northern Cape Province is struggling to restore IT systems that were hit by a Pysa ransomware attack last year. They started dumping data as proof without making a ransom demand first.
Electronics giant Foxconn suffered a ransomware attack at a Mexican facility. The attackers have demanded a $34 million ransom.
DoppelPaymer cybercriminals have attacked the network of Delaware County, PA government and are demanding $500,000 to free it up.
More than 3.8 Gb of Overlake OB/GYN files appear on PYSA data leak website, files include detailed medical history and personal data.
French multinational production and distribution firm Banijay Group SAS has been hit by a DoppelPaymer ransomware attack and had sensitive information stolen by the operators.
Gardiner Public Schools district are hit with a ransomware attack.
Spring Independent School District in Houston is the victim of Egregor ransomware.
St. Margaret's Hospicce files appear on PYSA data leak wesbite, less than 500 files include patient information.
Law In Order, an Australian supplier of document and digital services to law firms, suffered a ransomware infection over the weekend that is believed to be the Netwalker malware.
South Korean fashion and retail conglomerate E-Land Group said it has suspended operations at nearly half of its stores in the country due to a ransomware attack.
Mid-Florida Pathology files appear on PYSA data leak website.
Vote Joe, the site set up by the Biden-Harris Presidential campaign has been defaced by a Turkish hacker.

Irish gym management software company Glofox investigates reports of a recent data breach in which users' personal details may have been compromised. The startup was reportedly hacked by ShinyHunters.
The Sherman Independent School District is investigating a data breach after two Sherman High School students accessed private information.
Anonymous have taken down the Uganda Police website downed in the wake of protests trigerred by the arrest of presidential candidate Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (AKA Bobi Wine).
Reconstructive Orthopedic Center has been attacked by the DoppelPaymer gang who have added it to their leak site.
The Egregor ransomware gang has attached the Delta Dental Plans Association.
The Egregor ransomware gang has attacked Coldwater Orthodontics.
The Egregor ransomware gang has attacked Paramount Dental Studio.
American Bank Systems has been hit by a ransomware attack and had 53 GB of data stolen.
Managed web hosting provider Managed.com has been attacked by the REvil ransomware threat actors.

Umanis, a digital services company, has been hit bt the NetWalker ransomware.
Parkland Corp. has suffered a rasnomware attack. TA505 started publishing stolen data.

A ransomware attack brought Brazil's Superior Court of Justice systems to a standstill for over two weeks and is reportedly the "worst-ever" cyberattack suffered by a Brazilian government body.
The Maze ransomware gang adds Abington Reproductive Medicine to the list of their victims.

ShinyHunters leaks approximately 20 million BigBasket user records containing personal information and hashed passwords on a popular hacking forum.
Social housing provider Flagship Group has said it was hit by the REvil ransomware gang.

Sky Lakes Medical Center is a victim of Ryuk ransomware.

Taiwanese chip-maker United Microelectronics Corporation (UMC) has pleaded guilty to trade secret theft in the United States and will pay a $60 million fine in a case where it was accused of helping a Chinese state-owned chipmaker steal secrets from Micron Technology Inc in 2018.

A woman from Florida has been arrested after allegedly hacking into the home camera system of a family member as part of an extortion attempt.

The Hanover Chamber of Crafts has been breached by the REvil threat actors. However, data on the network does not appear to be encrypted.

Unit 02616 of Uzbekistan's National Security Service used FinFisher, a German spyware, to attack dissidents. Among the targets is the Palestine Chronicle a regional news outlet that reports on the Uzbek government.
Unit 02616 of Uzbekistan's National Security Service used FinFisher, a German spyware, to attack dissidents. Among the targets is Centre1 a regional news outlet that reports on the Uzbek government.
Unit 02616 of Uzbekistan's National Security Service used FinFisher, a German spyware, to attack dissidents. Among the targets is Eltuz a regional news outlet that reports on the Uzbek government.

Unit 02616 of Uzbekistan's National Security Service used FinFisher, a German spyware, to attack dissidents. Among the targets is Fergana News a regional news outlet that reports on the Uzbek government.

Nuclear Power Corporation of India Ltd (NPCIL) confirms that the network of a nuclear power plant was infected with malware. Several security researchers identify the malware as a version of DTrack, a backdoor trojan developed by the Lazarus Group.

actor: GRU Main Special Center for Special Technologies (Unit 74455) (SANDWORM)
description: Russian group Sandworm carried out large-scale cyberattacks against targets in Georgia. The hackers disrupted Proservice a webhosting site, which led to the defacement of as many as 15,000 websites. Additionally, two TV broadcasters, Imedi TV and Maestro, were taken offline as well.

The City of Johannesburg shuts down its website and billing systems after a group hacked into the authority's system and demanded a ransom of four Bitcoins worth about $30,000.
According to Logically AI, Pakistan starts a misinformation campaign against India, dubbed #GobackModi, via Twitter.

organization: High-profile Asian mobile hardware and software manufacturer
description: Researchers from ESET reveal that the Winnti Group hackers have used a new modular Windows backdoor, called PortReuse, to target a high-profile Asian mobile hardware and software manufacturer.
A Bulgarian hacker known as InstaKilla breaches EscortForumIt[.]xxx and Hookers[.]nl two online escort forums and stole the user information that he is now offering for sale on a hacking forum.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from FireEye discover new tools from the FIN7 group: a loader, dubbed BOOSTWRITE, that delivers payloads into memory and a module, dubbed RDFSNIFFER, that hooks into the remote administration software of ATM maker NCR Corporation.
A hacker dubbed Nathan uses the mailing list of retailer TOMS Shoes to tell users it's time to log off.
Anonymous Italia hacks 8 websites of the Italian Democratic Party (PD) and leaks 220 databases containing personal data in clear text.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers at JPCERT reveal the details of a campaign targeting Japanese government agencies and exploiting a vulnerability in the local SkySea Client View software (CVE-2016-7836).

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Jinan State Security Department (APT17)
event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers at JPCERT reveal the details of a campaign targeting Japanese government agencies and exploiting a vulnerability in the local Sanshiro spreadsheet application (CVE-2014-0810).
Gnosticplayers claims to have stolen more than 218 million records from Words with Friends a popular mobile social game from Zynga Inc.

Ghostwriter, a suspected Belarus-backed hacking group, has compromised websites and email accounts in Latvia, Lithuania, and Poland to publish fabricated documents pushing anti-North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) narratives consistent with Kremlin talking points. The influence campaign started in 2017.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Tianjin State Security Department (APT10)
organization: At least 17 Utilities in the US.
event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from Proofpoint disclose a new attack targeting US Utilities. The operation is dubbed LookBack.
World of Warcraft Classic is also hit by a DDoS attack.
Wikipedia is forced offline in several countries after a cyber attack hits the global encyclopedia.
Researchers from FireEye reveal that back in February, a hacker broke into a leading India-based healthcare website, stealing 6.8 million records containing patient and doctor information.

A threat actor targeted a number of foreign ministries, a Chinese technology company, Stanford University, think tanks in the United States and the United Kingdom, and other entities that have focused on North Korea's nuclear efforts or the related international sanctions. The threat actor created a network of malicious websites imitating the login portals of targets.

The Macon County Circuit Clerk's website is defaced.
A cyber attack takes down the websites of four Wairarapa medical practices: Tu Ora Compass Health, Kuripuni, Greytown, Featherston, and Carterton medical centres.

Hackers from Raidforums breach the site of rival hacking forum Cracked.to and spill data for more than 321,000 of its members. The breach occurred in July.
VandaTheGod defaces multiple sites associated with the University of Florida.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: The US Department of Justice reveals that an AT&T employees took bribes to unlock millions of smartphones, and to install malware and unauthorized hardware on the company's network.
Researchers from ESET reveal the details of Machete, a cyber espionage group active since 2010, stealing sensitive files from the Venezuelan military.
The online access portal for Murfreesboro Water Department bill payment is defaced.
The Randolph County website is defaced.

Capital One discloses a data breach impacting 100 million people in the United States, and 6 million in Canada. Data between 2005 and 2019 was accessed and related to information on consumers at the time when they applied for a credit card.
A disgruntled administrator leaves a backdoor in Club Penguin Rewritten (a kids' gaming website) that enabled hackers to steal login data for a little over 4 million accounts.
Intrusion Truth, an online group of anonymous cyber-security analysts, reveals the details of APT17 (AKA Deputy Dog and Axiom) another cyber-espionage hacking group linked to the Chinese government.

A threat actor conducted a phishing attack on Bellingcat who have been probing Russian intelligence activities. The phishing email was sent to Christo Grozev, a Bellingcat contributor. APT28 is suspected to be the threat actor.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: The Israeli Elite Force claims to have hacked the Palestinian Ministry of Interior.

A hacker steals the personal details of millions of Bulgarians and emails download links to local news publications. The data is believed to come from the country's National Revenue Agency (NRA). Kristian Boykov, a 20-year-old IT technician is arrested.
A hacking group under the name 0v1ru$ breaches SyTech, a major FSB contractor, defaces the web site, manages to steal 7.5 terabytes of data, exposing secret FSB project to de-anonymize Tor browsing.
Researchers from ESET discover a zero-day exploit (CVE-2019-1132), deployed in a highly targeted attack in Eastern Europe.
Three banks in Bangladesh are hit by the Silence group in May, suffering losses up to $3M.
Three banks in Bangladesh are hit by the Silence group in May, suffering losses up to $3M.
Three banks in Bangladesh are hit by the Silence group in May, suffering losses up to $3M.
Reuters reveal that hackers working for Western intelligence agencies broke into Russian internet search company Yandex in late 2018. Apparently the attack was carried out with a Regin variant.

organization: Iran computer systems controlling rocket and missile launchers
description: The US launch a cyber-attack on Iranian weapons systems. The cyber-attack disables computer systems controlling rocket and missile launchers.
Iran says it had exposed a large cyber espionage network allegedly run by the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency (CIA).
The official Twitter account of Bollywood's legend actor and producer Amitabh Bachchan is apparently hacked by Turkish hacking group calling itself Ayy?ld?z Tim.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Researchers from Morphisec Labs observe a new, highly sophisticated variant of the ShellTea/PunchBuggy backdoor malware that attempted to infiltrate a number of machines within the network of a target in the hotel-entertainment industry.
Jason, a tool for hijacking Microsoft Exchange email accounts allegedly used by the Iran-linked OilRig hacker group is leaked online.
Canva, a Sydney-based startup that's behind the eponymous graphic design service is hacked and data for roughly 139 million users are compromised.
Perceptics, the maker of vehicle license plate readers used by the US government is hacked. Its internal files are leaked and offered for free on the dark web to download.
The US Air Force opens an investigation into a "malware" infection, which it is blaming on lawyers employed by the US Navy who are working on a war crimes case.
In name of #OpPulizia, Anonymous Italia release leaks of the Italian Union of State Police and four additional national organizations.

TeamViewer confirms today that it has been the victim of a cyber attack which was discovered during the autumn of 2016, but was never disclosed. This attack is thought to be of Chinese origins and utilized the Winnti backdoor.

organization: Association of Surgeons and Odontologists in Savona
description: In name of #OpPharma, Anonymous Italia defaces and dumps data from the websites of four healthcare websites: the National Association of Hospital Primaries, ASSIST Italy, HS Hospital Services, and the Association of Surgeons and Odontologists in Savona.

In name of #OpPharma, Anonymous Italia defaces and dumps data from the websites of four healthcare websites: the National Association of Hospital Primaries, ASSIST Italy, HS Hospital Services, and the Association of Surgeons and Odontologists in Savona.

Israel's webcast of the Eurovision Song Contest semi-final is hacked with animated images of explosions. KAN, the national TV broadcaster in Israel, blames Hamas for the attack.

Two new leaks exposing Iranian cyber-espionage operations are published via Telegram, the Dark Web and the Internet. One claims to contain data from the MuddyWater group, while the second leak exposes a new group identified as the Rana Institute.
The "Unistellar" hacking group steals 275 million records of Indian citizens from a publicly configured Mongo database exposing and hold them for ransom.
Metro Presort was attacked by the Ryuk ransomware gang. At the time, the company was serving 21 healthcare entities which may have been affected by the attack.

organization: 30,000 Roman lawyers, including the Mayor of Rome Virginia Raggi
description: Hackers from LulzSec Italia and Anonymous Italia leak online sensitive data of 30,000 Roman lawyers, including the Mayor of Rome Virginia Raggi.
A Ryuk cyber attack takes down the data infrastructure of Johnson Newspaper Corp.

Cartoon Network portals in the UK, Hungary, Romania, Germany, Russia, Poland, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Norway, the Netherlands, Italy, Turkey, Mexico, Brazil, the Africa region, and the Arabic region have been affected.

actor: FSB 18th Center for Information Security (Berserk Bear)

organization: archivi-sias.it (National Archives from the Italian Ministry of Cultural Heritage and Activities)
description: Hackers from LulzSec Italia dump more than 5,000 credentials from the National Archives of the Italian Ministry of Cultural Heritage and Activities.

A collective dubbed Lab Dookhtegan reveal details about the inner workings of the cyber-espionage group known as OilRig, APT34, and HelixKitten, linked to the Iranian government. The source code of their tools is leaked on Telegram.

organization: Bangladesh Oil, Gas and Mineral Corporation (Petrobangla)
description: The official website of the Bangladesh Oil, Gas and Mineral Corporation (Petrobangla) is defaced twice in the space of few hours.
Bayer reveals to have contained a cyber attack carried out by the Wicked Panda Group via the WINNTI malware.

Hackers used spyware, developed by Israeli technology firm NSO Group, that exploited a vulnerability in the messaging app WhatsApp to inject spyware onto the phones of opposition politicians and prominent religious leaders in Togo. The hack coincided with pro-reform protests in the country. Among the victims is Raymond Houndjo, a prominent member of the opposition party.

The hack coincided with pro-reform protests in the country. Among the victims is Elliott Ohin who has served in several cabinet roles.

Sources report that the cellphone of Benny Gantz, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's biggest rival and the chair of the political alliance Kahol Lavan, was hacked by Iranian intelligence.

The group claims theu have hacked several insurers and legal firms including Hiscox Syndicates Ltd, Lloyds of London, and Silverstein Properties. To provide evidence, the group publishes the link to a 10GB archive.

description: Cylance uncover a sophisticated state-sponsored campaign, tracked as Operation Shaheen, against the Pakistan Air Force, carried out by a nation-state actor tracked as the White Company.
A hacker dubbed Erwincho leaks a file containing more than 5.4 million email addresses and 31,000 bank card numbers (six digits covered), claiming they belong to clients of Mobile World.

organization: News site associated with the Internet Research Agency (IRA)
description: The Washington Post reveals that a cyber-attack by a US security agency against Russia's infamous troll factory (Internet Research Agency) has resulted in a destroyed server RAID controller and formatted hard drives.
AnonPlus hacks the website of the Italian Society of Authors and Publishers (SIAE) and leak 4Gb of data.

Colbi Trent Defiore, an employee at a Virginia tech company, has been sent to prison for stealing PII from Healthcare.gov customers. Defiore improperly accessed the Healthcare.gov database several times in November 2018 and used the stolen information to commit fraud.
The hacktivist group Anonymous takes down 70 Gabon government websites as part of its "anti-dictatorships" campaign.

Ghostwriter, a suspected Belarus-backed hacking group, has compromised websites and email accounts in Latvia, Lithuania, and Poland to publish fabricated documents pushing anti-North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) narratives consistent with Kremlin talking points. The influence campaign started in 2017.
Rep. Pete King's campaign website is defaced.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor compromised the Federation Internationale de Football Association (FIFA) in December 2016 and January 2017. Seven of the individuals alleged to be behind this incident, believed to be Russian military intelligence (known as GRU), were indicted by the U.S. Justice Department.

organization: Canadian Centre for Ethics in Sport
event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor compromised the Canadian Centre for Ethics in Sport. Seven of the individuals alleged to be behind this incident, believed to be Russian military intelligence (known as GRU), were indictedby the U.S. Justice Department. Canada issued a statement attributing the incident to Russian military intelligence.

organization: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
description: A threat actor, believed to be Russian military intelligence, targeted the office of the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons in The Hague with a view of compromising its Wi-Fi network for espionage purposes.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Tianjin State Security Department (APT10)
description: The US Department of Homeland Security issues an alert about "ongoing" cyber-attacks against managed service providers, indirectly attributed to APT10.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Sensors
description: A joint technical alert from the DHS, the FBI, and the Treasury warns about a new ATM cash-out scheme, dubbed "FASTCash," used by the Hidden Cobra APT.
A report from The Citizen Lab reveals that the Canadian permanent resident and Saudi dissident Omar Abdulaziz was targeted by an attack infecting his phone with NSO's Pegasus spyware.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Sensors
description: Burgerville reveals a data breach impacting the chain which may have led to the theft of detailed credit card information belonging to customers.

Following the defeat of the Bangladeshi cricket team against India at the 2018 Asia Cup final, a group of Bangladeshi hackers defaces Virat Kohli's official website (the current captain of India's team) to protest against an 'unfair decision' during the match.
Gwinnett Medical Center(GMC) is hacked and the patient data is posted online.

organization: Unuci.org (Union of Italian Retired Military Officials)
description: LulzSecITA leaks the personal details of about 300 retired military officials.

organization: Italian National Institute for Social Assistance (INAS)
description: The portal of the Italian National Institute for Social Assistance (INAS) is hacked, compromising the information of 37,500 individuals.
A gambling application that is based on the EOS blockchain has a flaw in its smart contract system exploited. The attacker is able to make off with $200,000 worth of EOS due to the vulnerability.
Betting platform DEOSGames is drained of a significant chunk of its operating funds in a heist that netted one 'lucky' punter almost $24,000.
A threat actor targeted Mammoth Screen, a UK production company that produced Opposite Number, a television drama set in North Korea.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

industry: Administrative and Support and Waste Management and Remediation Services
description: Rousseau, the online platform of the Italian Five Star Movement is hacked again by rogue0, who leaks private data related to the donors.

Brazilian credit bureau Boa Vista SCPC investigates a possible hack, after a group of hackers called Fatal Error claimed it accessed the database of the company which has more than 350M personal data.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from NetScout Arbor reveal the details of a new campaign carried out by the Cobalt Group via spear phishing. One of the targets is NS Bank.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from NetScout Arbor reveal the details of a new campaign carried out by the Cobalt Group via spear phishing. One of the targets is Patria Bank.
The Brazilian operation of international fashion retail clothing chain C&A confirms a cyberattack to its gift card platform. Data from 36,000 customers who purchased gift cards is leaked on Pastebin.

A hacker breaks into the servers of TheTruthSpy, one of the most notorious stalkerware companies out there, and stole logins, audio recordings, pictures, and text messages, among other data. The breach occurred on February 2018.
Hacktivists from Anonymous Catalonia claim to have taken down the website of Bank of Spain.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Kaspersky Lab reveals the details of Operation AppleJeus, an attack against cryptocurrency exchanges carried out via a trojanized cryptocurrency trading application distributing the Fallchill malware.
A user called booloop a publishes a database containing over 850,000 US military officers personal information.
A threat actor targeted Ghanem al-Masarir, a Saudi dissident, for espionage purposes. The threat actor used the Pegasus tool, created by the NSO Group.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: A threat actor targeted Yahya Assiri, a critic of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, for espionage purposes. The threat actor used the Pegasus tool, created by the NSO Group.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

actor: GRU Main Special Center for Special Technologies (Unit 74455) (SANDWORM)
description: The state-run Spiez laboratory near Bern, which analyzed the nerve agent samples from Salisbury, reveals to have been targeted by hackers believed to be linked to the Russian government ahead of a conference of chemical and biological warfare.

organization: Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) chairman R S Sharma
description: Alleged personal details of the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) chairman R S Sharma are leaked after he tweeted his 12-digit Unique Identification Authority of India or UIDAI number and challenged hackers.

organization: Government agency in the Middle East
description: Researchers from Palo Alto Networks Unit 42 unveils a targeted attack against a government agency in the Middle East carried out by a threat actor dubbed DarkHydrus.
Kaiser Permanente's Health Innovations website is defaced by Dohaeragon.

actor: Coaches for the football team at Braden River
description: Coaches for the football team at Braden River (Bradenton, Fla.), are caught using a college Hudl account to access opponents' game and practice videos.
Hackers from the Shadow Brokers gain access to some 14,000 credit card numbers in Chile and publish them on social media.

actor: FSB 18th Center for Information Security (Berserk Bear)
description: Homeland Security Officials reveal that attackers from the malicious actor Dragonfly AKA Energetic Bear might have accessed the control rooms of U.S. Energetic Utilities.

Cybercriminals part of the notorious hacking group MoneyTaker attack the PIR Bank of Russia and steal $1M. The hacking is carried out after infiltrating the bank's systems by compromising an old, outdated router. The router was installed at one of the regional branches of the bank.
The website of Adhoc, a Cambodian rights group, is defaced.
Security researchers from the Z-Lab at CSE Cybersec reveal the details of Operation "Roman Holiday" an operation carried on by APT28 (AKA Fancy Bear) and targeting the Italian Military.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Hainan State Security Department (APT40)
description: A threat actor has compromised political parties, as well as organizations charged with overseeing the 2018 Cambodian elections, for espionage purposes. The threat actors, who are likely Chinese, have also targeted Cambodian government organizations. One of the targets is Monovithya Kem, the daughter of a jailed opposition leader.

The Israeli military say it had uncovered a plot by Hamas militants to spy on soldiers by befriending them on social media and then luring them into downloading fake dating applications that gave Hamas access to their smartphones.
ProtonMail is hit by a DDoS attack.
Researchers from Palo Alto Networks uncover a new operation conducted by the cyber espionage group known as Tick APT. The campaign targets a secure USB drive built by a South Korean defense company.

The Saudi hackers KINGDOM launched a phishing attack to attempt to trick journalist Ben Hubbard into installing NSO Group's Pegasus malware onto his phone. Hubbard does not recall clicking on the infected link sent to him via text message and it is unknown if his phone was infected.

A threat actor has compromised a government data center in Mongolia. Kaspersky Lab assesses that the threat actor used its access to compromise websites that they will use in subsequent watering-hole attacks.
North Korea-linked Lazarus APT Group planted an ActiveX zero-day exploit on the website of a South Korean think tank focused on national security.
Holland Eye Surgery & Laser Center notifies 42,200 patients about a hack occurred in 2016.

The Ticketfly website is defaced with an image of V from the film V for Vendetta. Unfortunately, after refusing to pay a 1 BTC ransom, Ticketfly reveals that the personal information of 27 million accounts, including ticket buyers and venue operators, was compromised.

Two students from Bloomfield Hills High School are the main suspects of a recent hack discovered at the school. The two broke into the school's MISTAR Student Information System portal where they changed grades, attendance records, and attempted to refund lunch purchases.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Data in Transit
description: Dubliner Connor Freeman has been arrested for his role in a SIM-swap cryptocurrency theft conspiracy that robbed victims of their life savings. One of the victims was Michael Templeman who lost $167,622.22.

description: Dubliner Connor Freeman has been arrested for his role in SIM-swap cryptocurrency theft conspiracy that robbed victims of their life savings. One of the victims was Seth Shapiro who lost $1,921,335.

description: Dubliner Connor Freeman has been arrested for his role in SIM-swap cryptocurrency theft conspiracy that robbed victims of their life savings. One of the victims was Darran Marble who lost $100,000.

organization: Official website of Russia's Federal Agency for International Cooperation (Rossotrudnichestvo)
description: The Anonymous deface several subdomains of the official website of Russia's Federal Agency for International Cooperation (Rossotrudnichestvo) against the ongoing censorship in the country especially the recent ban on Telegram.
Turkish hackers from Akincilar launch a new cyber attack against Honda Greece. The automaker's website in Greece is infiltrated with a message condemning the country for "partnering" with terrorists.
Hackers from the collective AnonPlus, a splinter cell of Anonymous, deface the website of K9 Web Protection (belonging to Symantec).

As a retaliation for the attacks of the Turkish collective Akincilar, Greek hackers from Anonymous paralyze the 24TV Live website for several hours. They also claim to have hacked 12,987 routers of Turk Telekom.

The Turkish hacker group Akincilar ("Invaders") starts its offensive against Greece and defaces four websites (Greek Foreign Ministry, Athens-Macedonia News Agency - ANA -, the Greek Handball Federation, and Suzuki-Greece).

The Turkish hacker group Akincilar ("Invaders") starts its offensive against Greece and defaces four websites (Greek Foreign Ministry, Athens-Macedonia News Agency - ANA -, the Greek Handball Federation, and Suzuki-Greece).

The Turkish hacker group Akincilar ("Invaders") starts its offensive against Greece and defaces four websites (Greek Foreign Ministry, Athens-Macedonia News Agency - ANA -, the Greek Handball Federation, and Suzuki-Greece).
The website of the City of Bologna is defaced by AnonPlus.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Tianjin State Security Department (APT10)
description: According to FireEye, the Chinese group APT10 has targeted Japanese defense companies, possibly to get information on Tokyo's policy toward resolving the North Korean nuclear impasse.
The official website of Thai Airways is hacked by a Pakistani with the moniker "Hunter butt". The hacker uploads a deface page on 23 subdomains.
The Red Bull website is defaced twice in few hours, probably exploiting the Drupalgeddon 2 vulnerability.
Hackers from AnonPlus deface ilgiornale.it, one of the main newspapers in Italy, with a fake news about Mr. Silvio Berlusconi in jail.
The website of Supreme Court of India is defaced.
An NHS website is defaced.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Researchers from Lookout reveal the details of an espionage campaign using two malware strains called Desert Scorpion and FrozenCell, to spy on targets in Palestine. The attackers are thought to be linked to Hamas.

Two hackers manage to deface several popular YouTube music videos, changing titles and thumbnail images. The list of the victims include the most-viewed YouTube video of all time, "Despacito". The two claim to have done it for Palestine.
The website of India's Ministry of Defence is defaced by suspected Chinese attackers.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Data Attack,Exploitation of End Host
description: Researchers from ESET reveal that the infamous Lazarus Group, a malicious actor linked to North Korea, has used a new toolset, including the destructive KillDisk, to target the network of an online Casino in Central America.

actor: Fredrick Lapointe; Rath Pak; Jimmy Saintelien
description: Three Montrealers have been arrested in connection with a 2018 data breach that exposed the information of 360,000 current and former teachers in Quebec.

Retailer Hudson's Bay Company discloses that it was the victim of a security breach that compromised data on payment cards used at Saks and Lord & Taylor stores in North America. Millions of cards may have been compromised (5 millions are already offered
The UK Anti-Doping Agency revels to have foiled an attempted cyberattack during the weekend that tried to access confidential medical and drug?testing data.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Hainan State Security Department (APT40)
description: Security firm FireEye reveals the details of TEMP.Periscope, a Chinese group focused on U.S. maritime entities that were either linked to -- or have clients operating in -- the South China Sea.
TheDarkOverlord claims to have breached H-E Parts Morgan. The breach seems to have occurred in November.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Researchers from Palo Alto Networks reveal a new campaign carried on by the infamous APT28 (AKA Fancy Bear AKA Sofacy) targeting an unnamed European Government, exploiting an updated version of DealersChoice, a platform that exploits a Flash vulnerability.
JJ Meds, a medical marijuana delivery service in Canada, goes offline after having received an extortion demand.

actor: Xi'an Tianhe Defense Technology, Defense Contrator (APT15)
description: Researchers at NCC Group reveal to have discovered multiple backdoors on a UK government contractor's computer systems designed to steal sensitive government and military data. The hack is tied to China-linked cyber espionage group APT15.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Florida Virtual Learning School notifies 368,000 current and former students, after an individual with the moniker $2a$45 uploads information of 35,000 students on a forum. Leon County Schools is among the affected organizations.

The Italian branch of the Anonymous collective leaks from the Italian Ministry of Education, 26,000 emails of teachers belonging to all level of schools. They also leak 200 administrative staff addresses.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: According to a report issued by the German news agency DPA, malicious actors from APT28 AKA Fancy Bear infiltrated several German government agencies, including the Defense and Foreign ministries, for more than a year. The hackers reportedly infiltrated the Informationsverbund Berlin-Bonn, an air-gapped network used by the German government.
And after the personal blog, hacktivists from Anonymous also deface Matteo Salvini's blog page.
The Italian elections are approaching, so Hacktivists from the collective LulzSecITA hack the blog of Matteo Salvini, the leader of right-wind Italian party "La Lega" and dump 70,000 emails.
Roomsurf notifies its users of a data breach in which the attacker has been able to obtain usernames, phone numbers, and email addresses.

actor: GRU Main Special Center for Special Technologies (Unit 74455) (SANDWORM)
event_subtype: External Denial of Service,Data Attack,Physical Attack
description: Pyeongchang Winter Olympics organizers confirm that the Games had fallen victim to a cyber attack during Friday's opening ceremony, but they refused to reveal the source. US intelligence the attack was carried by Russia while trying to make it appear as though North Korea was responsible.
The same hackers also claim to have hacked the website of Provincia di Milano (Province of Milan) in Italy.
The AnonPlus hacker group says they have hacked the Florence branch of the Italian centre-left Democratic Party (PD) and leaked data regarding leader Matteo Renzi online.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts,Exploitation of Sensors
description: A threat actor successfully compromised the networks of the Dukes (Cozy Bear), gaining visibility into the Dukes' targeting methods and operations. This compromise allegedly helped the U.S. intelligence community to attribute the 2016 compromise of the Democratic National Committee and other entities to Russian state-sponsored actors.
The Turkish Cyber Army hacking group strikes again and hijacks the Twitter account of vocal Donald Trump supporter and ex-Milwaukee County Sheriff David Clarke Jr.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Ghostwriter, a suspected Belarus-backed hacking group, has compromised websites and email accounts in Latvia, Lithuania, and Poland to publish fabricated documents pushing anti-North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) narratives consistent with Kremlin talking points. The influence campaign started in 2017.
Former Fox News hosts Eric Bolling and Greta Van Susteren appear to have their Twitter accounts hijacked by a group of suspected Turkish hackers dubbed Ayy?ld?z Tim.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Former Fox News hosts Eric Bolling and Greta Van Susteren appear to have their Twitter accounts hijacked by a group of suspected Turkish hackers dubbed Ayy?ld?z Tim.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: The verified Twitter account of Syed Akbaruddin. India's top diplomat to the United Nations, is briefly taken over by suspected Turkish hackers.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: The same hackers also manage to hijack the verified account of Borge Brende, the president of the World Economic Forum and former minister of foreign affairs for Norway.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Researchers from Trend Micro reveal that the state sponsored hackers behind APT28 (AKA Pawn Storm AKA Fancy Bear) targeted the US Senate in mid-2017).

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor targeted international sports organizations in Western Europe in the run-up to the International Olympic Committee's banning Russian athletes from participating in the 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor targeted international sports organizations in Western Europe in the run-up to the International Olympic Committee's banning Russian athletes from participating in the 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor targeted international sports organizations in Western Europe in the run-up to the International Olympic Committee's banning Russian athletes from participating in the 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor targeted international sports organizations in Western Europe in the run-up to the International Olympic Committee's banning Russian athletes from participating in the 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A threat actor targeted international sports organizations in Western Europe in the run-up to the International Olympic Committee's banning Russian athletes from participating in the 2018 Winter Olympics in South Korea.
Hackers have attempted to steal money from Bancomext, Mexico's government-run export bank, causing the lender to suspend operations in its international payment platform.

APT28 AKA Pawn Storm AKA Fancy Bear publish a set of apparently stolen emails purportedly belong to officials from the International Olympic Committee, the United States Olympic Committee, and third-party groups associated with the organizations.

APT28 AKA Pawn Storm AKA Fancy Bear publish a set of apparently stolen emails purportedly belong to officials from the International Olympic Committee, the United States Olympic Committee, and third-party groups associated with the organizations.
The Columbia Falls School District Number 6 in Montana, sends out letters to notify the breach occurred after the attack carried on by The Dark Overlord begun on September 1st, 2017.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: A hacker using the twitter handle @0x55Taylor posts some screenshots of a breach affecting all users who registered at thefly.com a leading digital publisher of real-time financial news between 2006 and 2015. The leak contains the data of 100,000 individuals.
The Anonymous hack the speed cameras database of an Italian city (Correggio) and dump the content.

Secureworks reveals a new spearphishing campaign circulating across bitcoin industry insiders in London, carried on via a fake job opening, and aimed to steal their online credentials. The fingers are pointed to the North Korean hackers of the Lazarus Group.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

actor: Central Scientific Institute of Chemistry and Mechanics
industry: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction
description: Security firm FireEye and Schneider Electric SE reveal the details of a new operation targeting Triconex industrial safety technology widely used inside nuclear, oil and gas plants. The first victim is allegedly located in Saudi Arabia. The malware is dubbed "Triton". A June 2021 indictment charges Evgeny Viktorovich Gladkikh, an employee of a Russian Ministry of Defense research institute and his co-conspirators, over causing two separate emergency shutdowns at a foreign targeted facility after deploying the Triton/Trisis malware.

A Vietnamese man, Le Duc Hoang Hai, is arrested for stealing sensitive security details and building plans from Perth Airport after breaking into its computer systems. The hack happened in March last year, and was carried on using the credentials of a third-party contractor.

In name of #OpIsrael and #OpUSA, hacktivists from the Anonymous Collective leak online names, emails, and passwords of Israeli public employees and share a list of US government sites to target, calling on action against them.
Data of 17,908 customers of Brazilian retailer Netshoes is dumped on pastebin.
The Anonymous leak some topology data belonging to Brazilian public sector.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Guangdong State Security Department (GSSD) (APT3)
description: The U.S. Department of Justice indicted three members of Boyusec, a China-based internet security firm, on charges including conspiring to commit computer fraud and abuse and conspiring to commit trade-secret theft. The victims included Moody's Analytics, Siemens, and Trimble. Though not mentioned in the indictment, Boyusec is believed to work on behalf of China's Ministry of State Security and be a front for APT3.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Guangdong State Security Department (GSSD) (APT3)
industry: Administrative and Support and Waste Management and Remediation Services
event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Data in Transit
description: The U.S. Department of Justice indicted three members of Boyusec, a China-based internet security firm, on charges including conspiring to commit computer fraud and abuse and conspiring to commit trade-secret theft. The victims included Moody's Analytics, Siemens, and Trimble. Though not mentioned in the indictment, Boyusec is believed to work on behalf of China's Ministry of State Security and be a front for APT3.
A group of Iraqi hackers called Daeshgram places pornographic images into the terror group's communication networks in order to undermine ISIS credibility.
The Anonymous collective publishes some internal documents stolen from the email accounts of some government employees.
Hackers from Team System Dz deface the Prince Albert Police homepage and leave the message "I love Islamic State".

Hackers from Team System Dz deface hundreds of websites across the US to post pro-ISIS messages, images of Saddam Hussein and a recruitment video. SchoolDesk, the Atlanta, Georgia-based web hosting company servicing these sites, confirmed the attack.
The Times of Israel and Asia Times websites are hijacked and defaced by suspected Turkish hackers, who post messages in favor of Palestine, on the 100th anniversary of the Balfour Declaration.
The Times of Israel and Asia Times websites are hijacked and defaced by suspected Turkish hackers, who post messages in favor of Palestine, on the 100th anniversary of the Balfour Declaration.

Line 204, a Hollywood film and television production and rental company, reveals that hackers from The Dark Overlord collective have stolen its client database. The breach probably happened in September 2017.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Two hackers going by the online handle of "n3tr1x" and "str0ng" deface the official blog (blog.jquery.com) of jQuery.

Tarte Cosmetics exposes nearly two million customers' personal data to the public via two unsecured MongoDB databases. Unfortunately the gang Cru3lty get hold of the data, demanding 0.2 Bitcoins for recovering the database once the data had been deleted or encrypted.

Using a tool called Bad Rabbit, a threat actor launched a ransomware operation that encrypted data on networks in Bulgaria, Japan, Russia, Turkey, and Ukraine. The operation is believed to have disrupted the Kiev metro system's payment network and delayed flights at Odessa's airport. In October 2018, the United Kingdom attributed this incident to Russian military intelligence.

The operation is believed to have disrupted the Kiev metro system's payment network and delayed flights at Odessa's airport. In October 2018, the United Kingdom attributed this incident to Russian military intelligence.

A hacker dubbed Mat AKA @0xScripts breaches Basetools.ws, an underground forum and demands a $50K ransom to avoid sharing stolen data with law enforcement.
In name of #OpCatalunya the Anonymous take down several Spanish including the Constitutional Court.
In name of #OpCatalunya the Anonymous take down several Spanish including the Constitutional Court.
In name of #OpCatalunya the Anonymous take down several Spanish including the Constitutional Court.
In name of #OpCatalunya the Anonymous take down several Spanish including the Constitutional Court.
In name of #OpCatalunya the Anonymous take down several Spanish including the Constitutional Court.
The Dark Overlord hackers break into London Bridge Plastic Surgery, a high profile, London-based plastic surgeon, and steal photos, including in-progress genitalia and breast enhancement.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: According to five former employees, Microsoft Corp's secret internal database for tracking bugs in its own software was broken into by a highly sophisticated hacking group more than four years ago.

Australia's foreign intelligence collection agency, the Australian Signals Directorate (ASD), says a hacker stole over 30 GB of data on the country's military capabilities, including details on fighter jets, military aircraft, and naval ships.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: The New York Times reveals that Israeli hackers broke into the Kaspersky network back in 2014 and advised the US about the NSA breach.

A hacking gang abuses the SWIFT banking network to steal $60 million after planting malware on a Taiwanese bank's servers. Two arrests are made in Sri Lanka related to the attack. The Lazarus Group is believed to be behind the attack.
The Dark Overlord claims to have hacked Austin Manual Therapy Associates and leaks a sample data.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: U.S. government officials told the Washington Post that the United States had launched a denial of service campaign against North Korea's Reconnaissance General Bureau, the country's intelligence agency.
The Ministry of Immigration and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Denmark, are hit by a DDoS attack thought to have come from a Turkish hacker group dubbed Aslan Neferler Tim.
The Ministry of Immigration and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Denmark, are hit by a DDoS attack thought to have come from a Turkish hacker group dubbed Aslan Neferler Tim.
TheDarkOverlord reveal another hack involving patient data. This time the victim is Auburn Eye Care Associates, despite the original hack dating back to June.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: SMART ("Sports Medicine and Rehabilitation Therapy") Physical Therapy is the n-th victim of The Dark Overlord.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: The Dark Overlord sends a threatening ransom note to the Columbia Falls (Montana) school district forcing officials to shutter its schools to ensure the safety of the students.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

actor: FSB 18th Center for Information Security (Berserk Bear)
organization: Swiss Federal Department of Defense, Civil Protection and Sports
description: Switzerland's Federal Department of Defense, Civil Protection and Sports reveals to have detected a cyber attack carried on by the infamous Turla APT.

Vevo, the joint venture between Universal Music Group, Sony Music Entertainment, Abu Dhabi Media, Warner Music Group, and Alphabet Inc. is hacked by OurMine. Roughly 3.12TB worth of internal files are posted online.

organization: Adult Internal Medicine of North Scottsdale
description: Adult Internal Medicine of North Scottsdale notifies of an incident affecting 11,798 patients.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Ghostwriter, a suspected Belarus-backed hacking group, has compromised websites and email accounts in Latvia, Lithuania, and Poland to publish fabricated documents pushing anti-North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) narratives consistent with Kremlin talking points. The influence campaign started in 2017.
Hand Rehabilitation Specialists notifies patients of a possible hack by The Dark Overlord that occurred back in July.
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: WikiLeaks' website appears to have been hacked by the OurMine collective.
Real Madrid's official Twitter account is hacked with a post announcing the signing of rival Lionel Messi appearing on their feed.
The OurMine collective takes over the official Twitter and Facebook accounts of Barcelona and falsely announce the signing of Angel Di Maria from Paris Saint-Germain.
The OurMine collective takes over the official Twitter and Facebook accounts of Barcelona and falsely announce the signing of Angel Di Maria from Paris Saint-Germain.
The official Twitter and Facebook PlayStation accounts are taken over by the hacking group OurMine. The attackers also claim to have managed to access a PSN database.

Hacktivist collective Anonymous reportedly leaks the private contact details of 22 GOP senators, in the wake of the Charlottesville violence and US President Donald Trump's controversial response to the event, asking for Trump's impeachment.

A member of the Anonymous hacking collective claims to have stolen data belonging to 1.2 million patients of the United Kingdom's National Health Service (NHS). The breach affected SwiftQueue, a software provider of dashboard and metrics solutions to healthcare providers.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Several HBO Twitter accounts are taken over by the notorious OurMine hacking group, posting #HBOHacked messages and warnings about security. Affected accounts include the main HBO Twitter account, as well as those for TV shows including Game of Thrones and Girls.

Several HBO Twitter accounts are taken over by the notorious OurMine hacking group, posting #HBOHacked messages and warnings about security. Affected accounts include the main HBO Twitter account, as well as those for TV shows including Game of Thrones and Girls.

Several HBO Twitter accounts are taken over by the notorious OurMine hacking group, posting #HBOHacked messages and warnings about security. Affected accounts include the main HBO Twitter account, as well as those for TV shows including Game of Thrones and Girls.
A group of hackers called 31337 leaks a second dump of data allegedly stolen from security company FireEye.
The Anonymous claim responsibility for carrying out a DDoS attack on the official website of Charlottesville city Virginia. The attack is conducted under the banner of #OpDomesticTerrorism.

Turkish hackers continue to target Armenian websites. The list of the targets involved in the latest spree of attacks includes the official website of the Development Foundation of Armenia and the official website of the Civil Service Council of Armenia.
A hacking collective called The Binary Guardians defaces roughly 40 Venezuelan websites including those of the government, the Supreme Court and the legislature.

organization: Supreme Tribunal of Justice of Venezuela website
description: A hacking collective called The Binary Guardians defaces roughly 40 Venezuelan websites including those of the government, the Supreme Court and the legislature.

Turkish hackers continue to target Armenian websites. The list of the targets involved in the latest spree of attacks includes the official website of the Development Foundation of Armenia and the official website of the Civil Service Council of Armenia.
A hacking collective called The Binary Guardians defaces roughly 40 Venezuelan websites including those of the government, the Supreme Court and the legislature.
An Indian hacker going by the online handle of Ne0-H4ck3r defaces the official government portal of Pakistan (Pakistan.gov.pk), leaving a deface page along with a message and a patriotic Indian song.
A Mandiant threat intelligence analyst is the victim of Operation #LeakTheAnalyst. Attackers infiltrate his computer for more than a year and leak some internal data.
Reuters reveals that Russian intelligence agents attempted to spy on President Emmanuel Macron's election campaign earlier this year by creating phony Facebook personas.
Victoria Justice's Twitter account is hacked. The attacker claims to reveal nude pictures.
Kylie Jenner's Snapchat account is hacked. The attacker claims to reveal nude pictures.

A dark web vendor is reportedly selling over 40 million US voter records from nine states in an underground market called RaidForums. The data being sold allegedly includes full names, addresses, voter IDs, voter status and party affiliations.

A threat actor targeted employees of companies that operate nuclear power plants in the United States, which prompted the Department of Homeland Security and the FBI to issue an alert to the industry. An administrative network of the Wolf Creek Nuclear Operating Corporation was compromised.

actor: GRU Main Special Center for Special Technologies (Unit 74455) (SANDWORM)
description: Threat actors deploy a tool, called NotPetya, with the purpose of encrypting data on victims' machines and rendering it unusable. The malware was spread through tax software that companies and individuals require for filing taxes in Ukraine and spread globally. Australia, Estonia, Denmark, Lithuania, Ukraine, the United Kingdom, and the United States issued statements attributing NotPetya to Russian state-sponsored actors.
