Ohio Gov. John Kasich's website is hacked, appearing to show pro-ISIS propaganda. Ohio first lady Karen Kasich's website, along with the Ohio Department of Rehabilitation and Corrections website, are also hacked.

New details emerge about the alleged hacks before the 2016 elections. Ken Menzel, general counsel of the State Board of Elections, reveals that nearly 90,000 records containing personal information were accessed by Russian hackers, with 90 percent of those records containing some kind of personal information.
A hacking group called CyberTeam claims responsibility for a DDoS attack against Skype.
A hacker calling himself Vigilance hacks a database belonging to the Minnesota state government, and steals about 1,400 email addresses and passwords.

A threat actor targeted individuals who were political critics and business rivals of Ricardo Martinelli, president of Panama between 2009 and 2014, for espionage purposes. The threat actor uses the Pegasus tool, created by the NSO Group. One of the victims is Col. Richard Downie (ret.), the former director of the Center for Hemispheric Studies at the National Defense University. He worked on the 2014 presidential campaign of Juan Carlos Navarro.

A threat actor targeted individuals who were political critics and business rivals of Ricardo Martinelli, president of Panama between 2009 and 2014, for espionage purposes. The threat actor uses the Pegasus tool, created by the NSO Group. One of the victims is Christian Ferry, a political consultant who advised the 2014 campaign of Martinelli's successor: Juan Carlos Varela.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Message Manipulation,Internal Denial of Service
description: It looks like two months before the U.S. Presidential Elections. MoRo, a group of hackers from Morocco allegedly tried to hack the US voting systems. In an attempt, they hacked four school districts from Florida, including the Miami-Dade School District.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: The father-in-law of celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay is jailed for six months after pleading guilty to attempting to hack into his computer to steal financial information and 'dirty' secrets on the star for the hacking plot to crack into Ramsay's private email.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Security firm FireEye reveals the details of a wave of attacks targeting Montenegro using spear-phishing, after its decision to join NATO.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: APT28 has targeted the Romanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs with phishing emails by spoofing a NATO email address.

The Dark Overlord, which recently leaked ten episodes of Netflix's "Orange is the New Black" makes a resurgence, releasing on the Pirate Bay a selection of eight episodes from ABC's upcoming network television show "Steve Harvey's Funderdome".
actor_country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Unknown hackers break into the website of the Qatar state-run news agency and publish a fake story quoting the ruling emir making comments that expressed support for Iran, Israel, Hezbollah and Hamas. The agency's Twitter feed is also compromised posting fake quotes from Qatar's foreign minister alleging a plot against the country by other Arab nations. US intelligence believes the hack was carried out by the United Arab Emirates.

Unknown hackers break into the website of the Qatar state-run news agency and publish a fake story quoting the ruling emir making comments that expressed support for Iran, Israel, Hezbollah and Hamas. The agency's Twitter feed is also compromised posting fake quotes from Qatar's foreign minister alleging a plot against the country by other Arab nations. US intelligence believes the hack was carried out by the United Arab Emirates.

Zomato, the popular restaurant and event listing service, is hacked and 17 million accounts are listed for sale on the dark web. The data on sale includes emails and hashed passwords of Zomato users, but the company said no payment or credit card data was not affected.
TrapX reveals to have repelled an attack against an unnamed military contractor carried on by Iranian hackers using a Russian Toolset.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Vietnamese threat actor Ocean Lotus has released documents stolen from the Philippine government including a transcript of a phone call between President Duterte and President Trump.

description: A group calling itself TuftsLeaks publishes documents online that contain sensitive financial information from Tufts. The leak includes department budgets, the salaries of thousands of staff and faculty and the ID numbers of student employees with salaries listed.

description: Cybercriminals steal personal records and photos of patients from the data system of a Lithuanian plastic surgery clinic and put them up for sale.
Denmark's Defense Intelligence Service says in a report that the Danish Ministry of Defense has had its emails hacked over the last two years. The hack has been attributed to Fancy Bear.

The same reports reveals that French presidential candidate Emmanuel Macron was targeted by APT28.
WauchulaGhost defaces 250 ISIS Twitter accounts with adult content.
Police are investigating after "malicious" messages are left on a school website by Turkish nationalists in an apparent hacking attempt.

description: The FBI arrests Zhengquan Zhang, a 31-year-old IT engineer, accused of installing malware on his employer's servers to steal proprietary source.

description: FireEye claims Chinese hackers are trying to break into South Korea's military to halt the deployment of an anti-ballistic weapons system in the country.
The LinkedIn page for McAfee is hijacked by a single person or an unknown number of individuals allegedly affiliated with the OurMine collective.

The Shadow Brokers dump a new collection of files, containing what appears to be exploits and hacking tools targeting Microsoft's Windows OS and evidence the Equation Group had gained access to servers and targeted the SWIFT banking system of several banks.
The Bricker Bot takes down the Zyxel HN-51 Modem belonging to Sierra Tel, a Californian ISP.
The Shadow Brokers (TSB) are back, and release the password for the rest of the hacking tools they claim to have stolen from the NSA last year.

IAAF, the governing body of global athletics says it has suffered a cyber attack that it believes has compromised information about athletes' medical records.

The Anonymous deface the official website of Boa Esporte, a second division football club in the state of Minas Gerais, after the team hired goalkeeper Bruno Fernandes das Dores de Souza convicted for murdering his ex-girlfriend.

A Kurdish hacker going by the online handle of "Rekan Error" defaces the official website of Fifth Harmony, an American girl group formed on the second season of The X Factor US in July 2012 and posts messages against ISIS and Turkey.

New reports reveal that Russian hackers are targeting U.S. progressive groups in a new wave of attacks. According to the report, at least a dozen groups have faced extortion attempts since the U.S. presidential election. The ransom demands are accompanied by samples of sensitive data in the hackers' possession.

zerodark70 sells a database supposedly containing 83,000 compromised accounts from UPI.com, the website of the 110-year-old American news agency United Press International.

In a form of protest against President Nicolas Maduro, Kapustkiy hacks a website of a local government and dumps around 900 records on pastebin.

Italian siblings Giulio and Francesca Maria Occhionero are arrested in Rome, charged with conducting a long-running cyber espionage campaign against leading Italian politicians, businessmen and Masons using a variant of the malware family EyePyramid. Among the victims are the grand master of Italy's biggest lodge, the president of the European Central Bank, Mario Draghi, and former Italian prime ministers, Matteo Renzi and Mario Monti.

organization: Little Red Door Cancer Services of East Central Indiana
description: The Dark Overlord hacks the computers of an Indiana-based cancer agency and asks for a large payment of 50 Bitcoin ($44,800) not to release the data. Initially the attack seemed to have been caused by ransomware.

description: A group claiming to be part of the Anonymous collective defaces the Victorian Equal Opportunity & Human Rights Commission website (humanrightscommission.vic.gov.au) with a nonsensical message about its social network AnonPlus.

description: Exploiting a vulnerability of Plone CMS, CyberZeist claim to have hacked fbi.gov and leaks the records of 155 FBI officials on pastebin. Plone denies that a 0-day vulnerability has been exploited to carry on the attack.

Hackers from World Hacker Team hack Tanzania Telecommunications Company Limited, a state-owned company that provides fixed basic telephone services, and dump the details of around 2,000 employees.
A hacker known as ROR[RG] dump 17.8GB of information data from the Turkish National Police (EMG) servers. The leak allegedly happened two years ago.

organization: South Africa Government Communications and Information Systems (GCIS)
description: In name of #OpAfrica, the Anonymous dump names, phone numbers, email addresses and hashed passwords of more than 1,000 government employees.
In name of #OpAfrica, Tobitow, a member of Team Hack Argentino and Anonymous Argentina, exploit a vulnerability in the Web hosting service of Webafrica and defaced 2,532  South African websites.

actor: GRU Main Special Center for Special Technologies (Unit 74455) (SANDWORM)
industry: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction
description: Researchers from Trend Micro unveil further details on the attacks targeting Ukraine in December. Samples of the same BlackEnergy family have been used to target a mining company and a railway operator in Ukraine.
In name of #OpAfrica, the Anonymous hack V-Report, a local job portal. They claim to have stolen the details of 33,000+ individuals, but only leak the details of 54 government employees.

actor: GRU Main Special Center for Special Technologies (Unit 74455) (SANDWORM)
description: Researchers from Trend Micro unveil further details on the attacks targeting Ukraine in December. Samples of the same BlackEnergy family have been used to target a mining company and a railway operator in Ukraine.

A group of Chilean hacktivists that go by the name of Chilean Hackers break into the database of CONADI and steal the personal details of 304,189 Chilean citizens looking for state benefits from the country's government.
A group of hackers breach the official email servers belonging to the Bolivian Army, download emails, and dump some of the data online.

actor: Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (APT 35 Charming Kitten)
description: Channel 10 reveals that hackers affiliated to Iran's Revolutionary Guard breached the computers of 1,800 individuals including a former Israeli Army Chief of Staff.
Penis AKA @DotGovs completes his job and dumps the data of 20,000 FBI Employees.
In the name of #FreePalestine, a hacker called Penis AKA @DotGovs dumps data belonging to 9,000 DHS officials. The trove is allegedly obtained after compromising the email address of a DHS employee.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of Network Infrastructure
description: Hacktivists kick off their #OpAfrica and breached the backend of the Broadband Systems Corporation.
And #OpAfrica continues with the dump of the details of 220 government employees from Uganda's Ministry of Finance.
Pakistani hackers deface the official web portal of the Indian Revenue Service (IRS).
@0x1Taylor hacks teksyndicate.com and dumps more than 30,000 records with usernames and hashed passwords.
SonnySpooks hacks epicbot.com and dumps 40,704 records with hashed passwords.
Roosh V, the controversial 'neo-masculinist', claims to have been doxxed by an online group associated with Anonymous.
The Blink Hacker group, a known division of the Anonymous hacker collective, has leaked the databases of 100 websites belonging to Thai prisons.

event_subtype: Exploitation of End Hosts,Exploitation of Sensors
description: A British judge has ruled against extraditing Christopher Taylor, a Wigan man who is alleged to have hacked hundreds of webcams around the globe, to the United States. Taylor was apprehended after it was discovered that he installed malware on a laptop at the Georgia Institute of Technology.

description: bRpsd hacks focusfeatures.com and dumps 13,040 usernames and hashed passwords.

The AnonSec collective claims to have broken into the computer systems of NASA, partially hijacking a drone, stealing hours of on-board footage from the agency's fleet of aircraft, hundreds of data logs from its weather and climate missions, as well as a list of names, phone numbers and emails of more than 2,400 employess.

A Group of Hacktivists calling themselves @NightmareSquad hacks the University of Queensland and dumps 9 individuals' e-mail addresses and clear-text passwords.

Hackers from the Anonymous collective say they breached supposedly secure Canadian government computers and accessed high-level, classified national security documents as retaliation for last week's fatal shooting by the RCMP of a protester in British Columbia. To support their claim, they publish a document that appears to be legitimate Treasury Board of Canada notes on federal cabinet funding to fix flaws in the foreign stations of the Canadian Security Intelligence Service (CSIS).

A hacker called DetoxRansome hacks BitDefender and blackmails the company, demanding a ransom of $15,000 and threatening to release the stolen usernames and passwords (allegedly kept in clear) in case the ransom is not paid.

organization: Public Service Labour Relations and Employment Board
description: Hackers from the Anonymous collective break into the network of the tribunal that adjudicates disputes between public servants and the federal government and dump 3856 records.
A hacker dubbed FireHack dumps furydown.com (a DDoS tool) and dumps 3000 usernames and hashed passwords.
Other escort services end up under the unwelcome attention of @ElSurveillance and are defaced.

@ElSurveillance continues his battle against websites that promote escorts. This time the target is captain69.co.uk and the leaked records are about 2600.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: Ashley Madison, an online dating website that specifically targets people looking to have an affair, is hacked by a group that calls itself Impact Team. The authors of the attack threaten to release the entire database of 37 million users.
@ElSurveillance starts his personal battle against websites that promote escorts, defacing MeetMeInYourCity.com and leaking 2500 usernames and clear text passwords.

Members of the Anonymous collective claim to have crashed the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) website as a part of a battle to retaliate for the murder of a member in a shooting involving the Canadian Police.

Hacker collective Rex Mundi claims to have stolen 24,000 financial records from Belgian loan company AFC Kredieten, and threatens to publish every loan applicant record in its possession if the company does not pay up a ransom. As proof that they have successfully hacked the company, Rex Mundi publishes some personal accounts and leaves a banner notification on the AFC Kredieten website.

Pakistani President Mamnoon Hussain's website (presidentofpakistan.gov.pk) is defaced by a group of Bangladeshi hackers called Blacksmith Hacker's Team. Inside the same operation, 72 other Pakistani government websites are defaced as well.
The AnonGhost collective takes over the Facebook and Twitter Accounts of the Malaysian Police and floods the feed with pro-ISIS messages.
An Indiana radio station, WXXR 97.3, is apparently hacked, broadcasting a message from the Anonymous collective.
Cloud mininig service cloudminr.io is hacked. The attacker offers to sell the entire database (about 80,000 users) for 1 BTC (approx. 276 USD).
cybervor aka @cyberv0r claims to have hacked the Miami University and dumps over 200 usernames and hashed passwords.

Unknown hackers affiliated with the collective Anonymous release a string of emails that appear to show a conservation officer defending his decision to refuse to kill two black bear cubs on Vancouver Island.

The Cyber Islamic State hackers deface a subdomain of Illinois-based Argonne National Laboratory owned and funded by the U.S. Department of Energy Office of Science.

organization: State Ministry for Euro-Atlantic Integration of Georgia
description: The Cyber Islamic State hackers deface the official website of The State Ministry for Euro-Atlantic Integration of Georgia (eu-nato.gov.ge).

actor: The Cyber Army of the Khilafah
description: Purported supporters of the hardline Islamic State group deface the website of the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights.

Primedice, an online gaming/gambling site loses $1 million in bitcoin to an attacker who exploited its random number generation (RNG) system.

Hacking Team, the Italian company behind the infamous surveillance software is hacked. The attacker, allegedly the same author behind the attack on Gamma International (another surveillance software) dumps approximately 400Gb of data by hijacking the Hacking Team Twitter account.
In name of OpIndia, AnonOpsindia, a group affiliated to the Anonymous collective hacks BSNL and claims to have siphoned the entire database, which has sensitive information of over 30 million users.

In name of #OpBillC51, the Anonymous hacks the Quebec Parental Insurance Plan Centre (http://www.rqap.gouv.qc.ca), The Ministry of Labor, Employment and Social Solidarity (http://www.mess.gouv.qc.ca) and The National Review Commission website on employment insurance.

organization: Ministry of Labor, Employment and Social Solidarity

Armenian hackers from Monte Melkonian Cyber Army hack into the official website ofÃÆÃ''ÃÆ'Ã'ÃÂ Azerbaijani customs (and other Azerbaijani sites), stealing highly confidential personal information of 5650 Azerbaijani citizens.
A hacker called savaka hacks the Plex server hosting the forums and the blog. The attacker asks for a ransom of 9.5 BTC to avoid the leak of the data.
A pro-ISIS hacker hacker dubbed Phenomene Dz defaces the website of The Accademia della Crusca (www.accademiadellacrusca.it), the most important research institution studying the Italian language.
KelvinSecTeam hacks the official websites of the Colombian football star James Rodriguez and dumps 1,855 usernames and hashed passwords.
Hacking collective @TheNetShip hacks ecasttv.co.nz and dumps its entire database.
The AnonGhost collective defaces two subdomains of the US Air Force. The targeted domains belong to Profession of Arms Center of Excellence and Professional Development Guide of the US Air Force.

organization: Arizona Department of Weights and Measures
description: The Middle East Cyber Army defaces the Arizona Department of Weights and Measures.

A hacker group dubbed Team Unknown claims to have successfully hacked into OlaCabs and managed to get access to sensistive information like credit-card history, vouchers, and user behavior. Ola denies these claims.

The official website of the US Army (army.mil) is defaced by attackers claiming to be associated with the Syrian Electronic Army. In addition to a message on the page claiming attriubtion, the attackers also include a pop-up message to anyone visiting: "Your commanders admit they are training the people they have sent you to die fighting."

Australia's third-largest internet service provider, iiNet, investigates claims that a database held by its subsidiary, Westnet, has been hacked and is being offered for sale by a hacker dubbed Mufasa.

The pro-Palestinian hacktivist collective AnonGhost defaces the official website of Piatt County, Illinois along with the website of the county's Sheriff office, election office and Highway Department.

description: Vietnamese threat actor Ocean Lotus has compronised the websites of numerous entitities in Southeast Asia to be used for watering-hole attacks. Some of the organizations have also been targeted with malware aiming to install backdoors on their systems. The group has targeted ASEAN, China, Cambodia, Laos, and the Philippines.

yPeRtRoN hacks an adult web site (thaimassagemodel.com) and dumps 4,614 records with usernames and hashed passwords.
Gaana, one of the top music streaming sites in India with more than 7.5 million monthly users is hacked by a Pakistani hacker called Mak Man, and its user database is exposed.

actor: Daniel Soares; Alex Mosquera; Erick Vaysman
description: Commack School District's computer system is hacked by 3 students.
Chris Jericho's Twitter account is hacked by a group called the Galvanize Mob. The attackers post some offensive messages.
The Anonymous breach into the official website of Thailand Senate and Public Health Ministry, and leak login credentials to protest against the country's alleged support for human trafficking.

Dr.SHA6H , the anti-Bashar Al Assad hacker from Syria, hacks into the official website of Uzbekistan Embassy in Kuwait (uzbekembassy.gov.kw) and demands governments around the world to bring peace in Syria.

The official website of the Embassy of Nepal in Washington (nepalembassyusa.org) is hacked by Moroccan Islamic Union-Mail, a group of Moroccan hackers who leave a message against the American invasion of Iraq and what happened afterwards.
The Anonymous breach into the official website of Thailand Senate and Public Health Ministry, and leak login credentials to protest against the country's alleged support for human trafficking.

@rmsg0d, a member of TeaMp0isoN, hacks minecraftpeforum.net (a Minecraft Pocket Edition Forum whose domain was recently expired) and dumps the forum's database containing 16,125 records with, usernames, passwords, and numerous other fields relating to for
An international group of hackers operating under the name AnonCoders defaces the main website of the Republican Party of Kentucky (rpk.org) to raise awareness that Muslims are not terrorists.
@TorProdigy hacks ottawaliving.ca and dumps 13,000 usernames and hashed passwords.
A group of pro-ISIS hackers called Moroccan Revolution Team defaces the website of Westchester Health (westchesterhealth.com).

Yemen Cyber Army defaces the Saudi Ministry of Foreign Affairs (services.mofa.gov.sa) and leaks plain-text login credentials of Saudi officials, conversations between embassies along with Embassies VSAT Communications. They also release, a few days after, some records of Saudi VISA Database, threatening to release 1M more. There is evidence that the Yemen Cyber Army is in fact a front for Iranian hackers.
The website for Philadelphia's City Council (phlcouncil.com) is hacked by a pro-Muslim hacker calling himself H1d3n Root.
After the Expo, the Italian Anonymous target the Italian Ministry of Defense (difesa.it), and leak a list of 1,700 accounts.

organization: English Language Academy of the Univerity of Auckland
description: A hacker group calling itself the Middle East Cyber Army defaces the website of the English Language Academy of the Univerity of Auckland (ela.auckland.ac.nz).

In name of OpUSA, the online hacktivists AnonGhost deface the official website of Wayne Country Sheriff's department (sheriff.co.wayne.in.us/) and leak its database containing login credentials of its employees.

Anonymous hacks the official website of Chile's National Municipal Information System (sinim.gov.cl), defacing it and leaking login details of officials. The attack is done in support of student protests against the government's education policy. The hacker behind the attack goes by CyberBloc.
A hacker dubbed Pr0digy hacks jonimitchell.com and dumps 9,000 usernames and clear text passwords.

The Syrian Electronic Army is back and apparently hijacks for a few minutes the mobile site of the Washington Post, displaying messages critical of the news media and Saudi Arabia. The 30-minute disruption occurs when hackers infiltrated a Washington Post content-delivery partner, Instart Logic.
In name of OpGreenRights, two websites under the administraion of the Brazilian government (brasil.gov.br and www2.brasil.gov.br) are taken down by a DDoS attack.
GrenXPaRTa claims to have hacked lottoland.co.uk and dumps 9,702 usernames and passwords
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

description: In name of OpGreenRights, two websites under the administraion of the Brazilian government (brasil.gov.br and www2.brasil.gov.br) are taken down by a DDoS attack.
The website of Kenyan President Uhuru Kenyatta (president.go.ke) is defaced by the Indonesian based Gantengers Crew.
A hacker called Fokinz hacks euromilhoes.com  and dumps 19,352 usernames and passwords.
A Saudi hacker going with the handle of RxR HaCker defaces the official website of the Iranian Ministry of Defense (gozinesh.mod.ir), insulting Iran's leader Ali Khamenei over war in Yemen.
A group of Brazilian hackers going with the online handle of ProtoWave defaces the official website of Vitor Vieira Belfort, a Brazilian mixed martial arts champion.
In name of OpGreenRights, the Anonymous take down the website of Areva, a French conglomerate in charge of building a Nuclear reactor

After the leak of Baltimore Police email addresses earlier this month, several officers fall victim to a phishing attack, and consequently a crew of hacktivists (Hagash Team) leak on Pastebin a set of eight email addresses and the passwords for accessing the accounts.
The pro-Palestinian hacking group AnonGhost defaces the official Malaysian domain of the famous energy drink Red Bull (redbull.com.my).

The Anonymous claim to have breached the servers of the Baltimore Police Department (baltimorepolice.org) and leak a set of Baltimore Police email addresses followed by the IP addresses of web and email services.

organization: Guam Department of Public Health and Social Services
description: The hacking group AnonGhost defaces a couple of GovGuam websites (Bureau of Statistics and the Department of Public Health and Social Services).
Rubber AKA @smitt3nz hacks wowfon.com, and dumps 5,392 usernames and hashed passwords.
The hacking group AnonGhost defaces a couple of GovGuam websites (Bureau of Statistics and the Department of Public Health and Social Services).
In the name of OperationItaly, the Anonymous take dow tickets.expo2015.org, the portal used to sell online the tickets for the Milan 2015 Expo.
A hacker affiliated with the Anonymous hacks a subdomain of the World Trade Organization and dumps personal data belonging to more than 2,000 WTO officials and staff members.
A Palestinian-friendly hacker going with the online handle HolaKo defaces a subdomain of rediff.com, a famous Indian news, information, shopping and entertainment web portal.
KelvinSecTeam hacks amigosmadrid.es and dumps 2,600 usernames and passwords.

A collective affiliated to the Anonymous, dubbed AnonOpsIndia, takes down the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (trai.gov.in) after the latter dumped more than a million Indian netizens' traceable personal details online.
Indonesian hackers going with the group handle of Gantengers Crew deface the Online Resources domain of MasterCard (arm.mastercard.com).
@Compl3x1ty hacks the St. Joseph Medical Group (tjoemedicalgroup.com) and dumps 98 usernames, MD5 encrypted passwords, and email addresses.
The Anonymous target the world's largest animal abuse forum (beastforum.com) with a DDoS attack, forcing it to go offline.
The Wilmington Public Schools website is defaced by Team System DZ. The hackers publish a page supporting ISIS.

Tesla Motors Inc.'s Twitter feed and its media-relations e-mail account are hijacked by a group dubbed RIPPRGANG. The hackers are able to post messages to the company's more than 564,000 followers. Nearly in contemporary the homepage is redirected to an external domain by an online group called Autismsquad.

industry: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction
description: A collective called Angel_Of_Truth hacks Detour Gold Corporation and dumps several data on pastebin. The attack is done in retaiation for the Canadian sanctions against Russia.
The Anonymous hack an Israeli arms importer and manufacturer Fab-Defense (fab-defense.com) and leak login credentials plus personal details of its local and international customers.
In name of #OpIsrael2015, @Apex_Haxor hacks calcalit-tamar.co.il and dumps 1,200 records.
Team System DZ defaces the official mobile website (mobile.utoronto.ca) of the University of Toronto .
Part of Northwestern University's network has been offline for over a week as a result of a hack first disclosed on Twitter by  4/2o Cell AKA @Puttied.
Three Bangladeshi hackers going with the handles of Ne0-h4ck3r, TiGER-M@TE and F0RTYS3V3N, hijack the Google, Google Images, YouTube and Yahoo Malaysia domains.
Three Bangladeshi hackers going with the handles of Ne0-h4ck3r, TiGER-M@TE and F0RTYS3V3N, hijack the Google, Google Images, YouTube and Yahoo Malaysia domains.

Another French television targeted by hackers. This time the victim is France TVvisions and the attackers make off with off with data of 19,000 viewer requests to participate in televised games and 108,000 contacts.

Gaza Team, a pro-Palestinian group of hackers, hacks The Jewish Press. The site displays a black backdrop with a man holding ISIS-type flag. The team vows to hack many more pro-Israel websites in the future.
Eddie Raymond Tipton, the former security boss of the Multi State Lottery Association, is charged with fraud after allegedly hacking with a rootkit the computer that picks the winning numbers.

A Turkish hacker with the handle @THTHerakles shut down the Vatican City official website (vatican.va) to protest against Pope Francis' remarks in which he used the word "genocide" to refer to mass killings of Armenians by Turks.
In name of #OpSaudi, the Yemen Cyber Army hacks alhayat.com and dumps 926 records including usernames and hashed passwords.
Hobart Airport's website is defaced by Team System DZ with a message supporting radical group Islamic State (IS) over the weekend.
The hacker group Anonymous Quebec takes down the Montreal Police department website and the officers' union to protest against the brutality used during student demonstrations.
The Anonymous breach into an Israeli gun shop website (lhbltd.com) and leak login credentials plus personal details of its local and international customers, including some government officers.
AnonymousGlobo defaces several Chinese government websites including the Hunan (a province in China) Police Academy website in solidarity with pro-democracy protesters in Hong Kong.
The website of Turkmenistan's embassy in Belarus is taken offline following an apparent hack by two ISIS supporters.

event_subtype: Message Manipulation,External Denial of Service,Internal Denial of Service, Physical Attack
description: TV5Monde, a multi-station television network headquartered in Paris, France, has 11 of its TV stations taken off the air. In the same time it suffers an internal IT outage alongside a social media and website takeover. The Cyber Caliphate, a group of Pro-ISIS hackers claims responsibility. However, it was later revelated that the hack was a false flag operation carried out by APT28.
Other #OpIsrael attacks: Anonymous, Anonymous Arabe, Anonymous Arab and AnonGhost deface several private domains and several governmental sites in addition to leaking data of Israeli citizens.

organization: British Department of Environment, Food & Rural Affairs
description: Islamist hackers of the Moroccan Islamic Union-Mail deface uk-air.defra.gov.uk, a website run by the British Government's Department of Environment, Food & Rural Affairs (DEFRA) and dedicated to monitoring air pollution.

A group of hackers going with the handle of Indonesian Cyber Freedom defaces a sub-domain of the United Nations website (sgp.undp.org).
4/2o Cell AKA @Puttied hacks a subdomain of wellesley.edu (mobius.wellesley.edu) and claims to have obtained 700 records.
PH1K3 hacks domainstream.se and dumps 1,149 records with Personally Identifiable Information

The pro-Bashar Al Assad hackers from the Syrian Electronic Army claim to have hacked popular hosting companies running under the Endurance International Group. The list of hacked hosting companies include Bluehost, Fastdomain, Hostgator, Hostmonster and Justhost.

SkYz0 hacks paths-123.com and dumps 7,269 usernames and clear text passwords.

Saudi hackers from Team Bad Dream deface the official website of U.S. Army Picatinny Arsenal (pica.army.mil).
The website of Air France's national mutual society (mnpaf.fr) is defaced by a group calling itself Moujahidin Team, in retaliation for the Setif and Guelma massacres that happened on May 8, 1945.
Histeria hacks lumensfactory.com and dumps 2,550 usernames and clear text passwords.
The Website of the Nigerian Electoral Commission (inecnigeria.org) is defaced by the Nigerian Cyber Army on the morning of the general election day.
After Indiana's Governor Mike Pence signed the controversial religious freedom bill law, @YourVikingdom2015 takes down the Official Indiana website in.gov.
R3dm0v3 hacks virgilfilmsent.com and dumps 3,482 usernames and passwords.
Ebu Duhan hacks pvpserverin.com and dumps 2,614 usernames and passwords.

A malicious user going by the handle of bluebunny14 exploits the open submission structure of Steam's Greenlight section to briefly hide malware links in cloned versions of five legitimate game pages.

organization: New York Police Department Captain Endowment Association
description: The NYPD's Captain Endowment Association's website (NYPDCEA.org) is injected with malware. The Anonymous claim responsibility for the attack, even if the attribution is uncertain.

A group of pro-ISIS hackers from Morocco, going with the handle of Team System DZ defaces several high-profile websites of Wisconsin's Richland County, including the county's Sheriff's department website.
Ouch hacks csgameservs.com and dumps its entire database on pastebin (7,661 records). To remove the database the hacker asks for a ransom of $20 worth bitcoins.
This time Ouch hacks artazart.com and dumps its entire db on pastebin (6,795 records). Once again, to remove the db the hacker asks for a ransom of $20 worth bitcoins.
Chrichir hacks the FIT college (fitcollege.edu.au) and claims to have accessed 5,000+ student records, and more than 6,000 payment records.
Alex Van Handle AKA @ThaSinister hacks fenderforum.com and dumps 76,682 records.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: The South Korean government issues a report blaming North Korea for network intrusions that stole data from Korea Hydro and Nuclear Power (KHNP), the company that operates South Korea's 23 nuclear reactors.
A hacker dubbed Chrichir AKA @ChrichirTheGod hacks the University of Oklahoma and dumps some internal data.
Chrichir hacks the South West TAFE (swtafe.vic.edu.au), and, as proof, dumps some internal tables.
Bitcoin Baron claims to have hacked the City of Moore in Oklahoma (www.cityofmoore.com) and demands a ransom of 100 bitcoins to protect the private data acquired.
5elafa Book, a pro-ISIS Facebook clone is forced offline after just a day; and a linked Twitter account was shut down by supporters of the Anonymous collective.

The online Turkish hacktivist group RedHack defaces the official website of Istanbul Police Association (istanbulpolisdernegi.org) in tribute to Berkin Elvan, a 15-year-old teenager who died on March 11, 2014.
The Anonymous claim to have taken down the Madison Police Department over Tony Robinson Jr. Shooting.
The actions of the hacktivist group AnonGhost are not isolated: now they deface the official website of the state of Louisiana Rapides Parish Police Jury, Southern Heritage Bank and Churchill Banks.
FRID4Y AKA @_FRID4Y_ hacks epicpr.com and dumps 21,500 usernames and clear text passwords.
And for the second time in a week, the Anonghost deface, once again, the official website of Colorado's Larimer County Sheriff's Office.
The official website of Colorado's Larimer County Sheriff's Office (LCSO, larimersheriff.org) is defaced by the Pro-Palestinian hacking group AnonGhost.
Bitcoin Baron takes down the City of San Marcos and San Marcos PD websites in retaliation for the assault on a student.
Bitcoin Baron takes down the City of San Marcos and San Marcos PD websites in retaliation for the assault on a student.

The pro-Russian hacktivist CyberBerkut leaks several documents allegedly hacked from the mobile device of a Green Group Defense Services official, who recently visited Kiev as a member of American military delegation.
Rubber AKA @smitt3nz hacks neofriends.com, a dating site, and dumps 7,495 usernames and hashed passwords.
Sinister hacks Scott Herman's muscularstrength.com and dumps 55,000 records with usernames and passwords.

event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: A group of hackers calling themselves Team Hans manages to gain access to corporate information belonging to Rogers, a Canadian telecommunication and media company and dump 400Mb of data.

actor: Ministry of State Security's (MSS) Guangdong State Security Department (GSSD) (APT3)
event_subtype: Exploitation of Application Server,Exploitation of End Hosts
description: Hackers conducted a combination of financially motivated and espionage-driven hacking operations against hundreds of companies, organizations, and research firms based in the United States and other countries, stealing terabytes of information. One of these targets was the Hanford Site, a Department of Energy nuclear waste complex. The two hackers, Li Xiayou and Dong Jiazhi, allegedly carried out their activities with the help of China's Ministry of State Security.
f AKA @CIeaver hacks frontalot.com and dumps about 66,000 usernames and hashed passwords.
Dump Phenom hacks orphan-boy.com and dumps 3,765 usernames and clear text passwords

organization: Japan Association of Zoos and Aquariums
description: In the name of OpSeaWorld, Anonymous hackers hack the Japanese Association of Zoos and Aquariums (jaza.jp) and leak about 1,500 usernames and clear text passwords.
Eric Walstrom, a student at New Dorp High School hacks into a secure computer system to improve his scores. Unfortunately he is discovered.
The group of hacktivists Sudoh4k3rs hacks the two subdomains of the University of Lisbon and dumps the database and the administrator password.

Almost a week after revelations surfaced that Lenovo preinstalled dangerous ad-injecting software on consumer laptops, hackers of the Lizard Squad collective take their revenge: they initially hack Web Commerce Communications (webnic.cc).

event_subtype: Message Manipulation,Exploitation of Data in Transit
description: Actors hack the main Lenovo web site, hijacking the lenovo.com domain name, and also leaking several company emails.
@ThySavi0r & @anonf8 from #8bitCrew hack hemda.org.il and dump 1,324 usernames and clear text passwords.
The domain name for Google's search engine in Vietnam, google.com.vn, is briefly hacked and hijacked by the hacker collective Lizard Squad and redirected users to a website selling cyberattack tools.
In the name of OpSaudi, The Oppressed Defenders take down the online banking domain of Arab National Bank.
LNO uNiTy AKA @LNOuNiTy hacks dexsil.com and dumps about 6,000 usernames and passwords.
In name of OpChapelHill, the online hacktivist AnonGhost deface the official website of a Carlsbad, California based private military school (armyandnavyacademy.org).
Hacking group Lizard Squad returns with a couple of alleged fresh attacks against Microsoft's Xbox Live Service and Daybreak Service, the studio formerly known as Sony Entertainment Online.
GrenXPaRTa hacks the Nigerian Nation Assembly (nassnig.org) and dumps 49 MB of data.
Hacking group Lizard Squad returns with a couple of alleged fresh attacks against Microsoft's Xbox Live Service and Daybreak Service, the studio formerly known as Sony Entertainment Online.
@GroundingPlanes and @Guidelines hack kiwiblitz.com and dump about 9,000 usernames and hashed passwords.
As part of OpSaudi, a group of hacktivists calling themselves "The Oppressed Defenders" takes down the Saudi Arabian bank AlJazira.
The group of Pro-Palestine hacktivists Anonghost claims to have hacked the State University of Ohio (osu.edu) and dumps a list of 200 defaced domains.
Bl4CKJ0K3R hacks skikarte.si and dumps 1,628 usernames and hashed passwords.
Anonymous hackers supporting ISIS deface Al Ittihad, UAE's oldest Arabic language newspaper.
The Facebook page of the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights is hacked by the Syrian Electronic Army which accuses the Observatory's head of collaborating with British intelligence.
Thousands of students of the University of Sidney are informed that, due to an information security breach, their personal information could now be in the hands of hackers.
In name of OpSeaWorld, hacktivists hack imata.org (International Marine Animal Trainers Association) and dump 1,445 usernames and hashed passwords.
The CyberCaliphate hacks the Newsweek Twitter Account (@Newsweek) and threatens US President Barack Obama.
In the name of OpISIS, the Anonymous take down hundreds of Twitter and Facebook accounts belonging to the extremist group ISIS.

Hackers from 3xp1r3 Cyber Army deface the sub-domain of the official Arizona Department of Emergency & Military Affairs (ems.azdema.gov). The targeted sub-domain belongs to AZARNG (Arizona Army National Guard).
Zyklon hacks the Macalester College (in particular the sub-domain soviethistory.macalester.edu) and dumps 3,600 accounts (claiming he has other 90,000).
Zyklon hacks bigblueinteractive.com and dumps 3,997 usernames and passwords.
Zyklon hacks aquamarineboat.com and dumps 1,928 usernames and clear text passwords.

description: Book2Park.com, an online parking reservation service for airports across the United States, appears to be the latest victim of the hacker gang that targeted Target and Home Depot.
A hacker called xaxaxax hacks photostock.am and dumps 1,939 records with personal details.
Anonymous Philippines defaces several Philippine government websites to protest against President Benigno Aquino III's apparent missteps in the wake of the deadly clash in Mamasapano, Maguindanao.
p0lak & sh0utz hack phoncert.com, a mobile audio streaming service, and dump 2,800 usernames and clear text passwords.
Hotmanila.ph, a satyrical website, is defaced by a group called Bloodsec International.
The website of the Woman Resource Centre (wrc.org.uk) is defaced by Team System DZ, a group of supporters of ISIS and Jihad.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

Several University of Washington websites are defaced, and the pages are replaced by an extremist message that promises death to Americans in Iraq.
Anonymous Protection AKA @AnonymousUK2015 takes credit for taking down the website (lizardpatrol.com) and the Twitter account (@LizardMafia) of the infamous LizardSquad Collective.

The Lizard Squad seizes the website of Malaysia Airlines (malaysiaairlines.com) and redirects the users towards an external page with: a tuxedo-wearing lizard, a reference to the loss of the MH370 flight, and eventually some phrases praising ISIS.
@IncursioSubter hacks the official website of Oklahoma County (oklahomacounty.org) and dumps 1,145 usernames and passwords.

The majority of the Ghanaian government's websites, including its main site (ghana.gov.gh), have been hacked by a Turkish nationalist collective called Alsancak Tim.

A hacker called abdilo (@abdilo_) claims responsibility for breaching the database of Australian travel insurer Aussie Travel Cover on December 18 last year. He claims to have exfiltrated 700,000 records.
Yet another victim of the Syrian Electronic Army. The Twitter account of the French newspaper Le Monde is hacked and posts a polemic tweet "Je ne suis pas Charlie".

description: Some websites owned by Las Vegas Sands Corp, one of the world's largest casino operators, have been hacked and defaced by a group called the Anti WMD Team. The defaced page also contains personal information of Sands employees including e-mail ID and social security numbers. Additionally, the attackers deployed data-wiping malware on the Sands networks, severely disrupting their operation. The attack was allegedly carried out by Iranian hackers in retaliation for a remark by Sands Corp CEO Sheldon Adelson.

Hacktivists from Ukrainian neo-fascist Svoboda party deface more than 30 Ukrainian government and media websites.
The hacking group NullCrew AKA @NullCrew_FTS claims to have successfully hacked Bell Canada (bell.ca). As a consequence 40,000 credentials are leaked.
Jean-Jacques Quisquater, a Belgian cryptographer, is an apparent victim of the NSA's Regin malware.
The official website of Nigeria's Ministry of Police Affairs (policeaffairs.gov.ng) is breached and defaced by hackers of the Nigerian Cyber Army.
A hacker affiliated with the Anonymous hacks the official email account belonging to the press and communication department of Sao Paulo state government (saopaulo.sp.gov.br/).

organization: Board of Control for Cricket in India
description: A Bangladeshi hacker called Ashik Iqbal Chy defaces the official website of Indian cricket's Governing body (bcci.tv) to protest against takeover proposal.
Another episode of the Cyber War between India and Pakistan. The official website of the Indian Railways is once again defaced by Pakistani Hackers.

The Syrian Electronic Army hacks several accounts belonging to CNN. Targets include: CNN's main Facebook account, CNN Politics' Facebook account and the Twitter pages for CNN and CNN's Security Clearance. Blogs for Political Ticker, The Lead, Security Clearance, The Situation Room and Crossfire were also hacked.

The Islamic Cyber Resistance (ICR) hacks the official Perl blogs (blogs.perl.org) and dumps 2,924 user account credentials. The official web page is also defaced.
SultanHaikal from Gantengers Crew defaces 6 official domains of Ubuntu One.
country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland

Anonymous takes down the official website of Fullerton police department against the arrest of protesters and acquittal of police officers who had beaten the homeless Kelly Thomas to death in 2011.
Hackers from TeamBerserk announce a leak of documents allegedly obtained from a FBI Fusion Center.

The RedHack collective takes down the official website of the Central Bank of Turkey (tcmb.gov.tr) to protest poor monetary policy.
Hackers of the RedHack collective leak the phone numbers of over 4,000 people who work for Turkcell, the leading mobile phone operator of Turkey.

Hackers of the RedHack collective breach the systems of the General Directorate of EGO (ego.gov.tr), the organization that serves as the public transport department for the municipality of Ankara, the capital city of Turkey.
The Turkish hacking collective TurkGuvenligi defaces the Syrian Electronic Army's website.
19 official domains of AVG are defaced by different hackers from Indonesia and Pakistan.
In the same campaign the Syrian Electronic Army hacks the Twitter Xbox Support account, the Xbox Twitter and Instagram, and Microsoft employees.

Hackers of the Pakistani group TeaM MaDLeeTs hack the organization responsible for the registration of Montenegro domain names (domain.me). As a result of the hack, around 3,500 domain names have been hijacked and redirected to a defacement page.
The Infamous RedHack collective hacks the country's Parliament, the Turkish Contractors Association, the Turkish State Railways (TCDD) and the Justice and Development Party (AKP).
Exactly one year since Aaron Swartz passed away, hacktivists of the Anonymous collective deface a subdomain of MIT (cogen.mit.edu) in the name of #OpLastResort.
In the name of OpFunKill the Anonymous take down the Namibia main Government portal gov.na
